EmailTemplate.name: VNS_FusionePCR Integration with VisiCAD.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Recording Now Available: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 28, 2011 Thanks for Attending the "Using Fusion with VisiCAD" Webinar
Thank you for joining us in yesterday's webinar "Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD." We hope that you were able to see first hand the benefits of Fusion ePCR and its integration with VisiCAD, such as:
Complete patient care reports in less time Improved communications with field staff Reduced data entry mistakes Consistent information between systems
If you would like to review the webinar again or share the information with someone else, please reference the links below for the recording and the datasheet:
Webinar Recording Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/vkyssbw Fusion ePCR Datasheet link: http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Fusion_ePCR.pdf Fusion ePCR 6.2 New Features Datasheet Link: http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/EMS_ePCR_6-2Features_101311_lo.pdf
For more information, please contact your Client Account Managers Ken Schulte or Sally Olson-Nelson.
Ken Schulte ken.schulte@tritech.com
Sally Olson-Nelson sally.olson-nelson@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
